scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend:local: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend:prod: cd frontend && npm install && REACT_APP_API_URL=https://zammer2.uc.r.appspot.com/api npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.gcp-build: echo 'Building frontend...' && cd frontend && npm ci && REACT_APP_API_URL=https://zammer2.uc.r.appspot.com/api npm run build && echo 'Copying build to backend...' && mkdir -p ../backend/public && cp -r build/* ../backend/public/ && echo 'Installing backend dependencies...' && cd ../backend && npm ci --production && echo 'Build complete!'
scripts.deploy:gcp: npm run build:frontend:prod && gcloud app deploy app.yaml --quiet
